articles.description: Kaley Cuoco and Tom Pelphrey confirmed they're dating with PDA photos, marking her first public relationship since her divorce from Karl Cook in 2021.
articles.content:
Kaley Cuoco and Tom Pelphrey make one cute pair!
"The Flight Attendant" star shared photos on Instagram Tuesday cuddled up to Pelphrey, 39, while on an outdoorsy getaway surrounded by trees.

articles.title: America's Got Talent's Jonathan Goodwin shares first picture of himself in a wheelchair - Daily Mail
articles.description: America's Got Talent star Jonathan Goodwin has shared the first picture of himself in a wheelchair - after his fiancée Amanda Abbington revealed he has been left paralysed for life.
